mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_pw = SHA2(#{userPw} , 256)

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_name, u.user_tel, u.user_company, u.manage_position, u.manage_task, u.joined_at, auth.auth_id, auth.auth_nm FROM user_info u INNER JOIN user_auth auth ON u.auth_id = auth.auth_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, user_pw, auth_id, user_email, user_name, user_tel, user_company, manage_position, manage_task) VALUES (#{userId}, SHA2(#{userPw}, 256), #{authId}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userCompany}, #{managePosition}, #{manageTask})
